snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating Peter J. Eichler Jr., a Los Angeles money manager, as his firm, Aletheia Research and Management, filed for bankruptcy protection late Sunday.
abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission is investigating Peter J. Eichler Jr., a Los Angeles money manager, as his firm, Aletheia Research and Management, filed for bankruptcy protection late Sunday.

headline.main: S.E.C. Said to Be Investigating Money Manager's Trading Practices
headline.print_headline: Money Manager Whose Firm Filed for Bankruptcy Is Said to Be Under Investigation
